answers.text: When you need to make a calculation and receive the result
When you need to add a pop-up window to the screen
When you need to input data

quizzes.question: When is the "return" statement most frequently needed?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Function Return[/h1]

A function can have an optional [b]return [/b]statement. It is used to return a value from the function. 

This statement is useful when making calculations that require a result.
[note]When JavaScript reaches a [b]return [/b]statement, the function stops executing.[/note]

answers.text: At the end of the function description
At the beginning of the function description
